root.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Special Editions
root.description: OverviewSpecial Editions was released for XBLA, PSN and later made it onto Steam. The game can be played single player or competitively with up to 3 other people locally and makes use of the iconic 50-50, Phone-A-Friend and Ask The Audience lifelines as well the Fast-Finger-First segment. Special Editions comes with 1200 questions of general knowledge and was released alongside a Southpark themed DLC and a movie themed DLC priced at 400 Microsoft points and 240 Microsoft points, respectively. The standalone game launched at 800 Microsoft points or 10$.
